Human: Consider the following prompt:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hi Nigel, I'm trying to schedule a 30 minute meeting for us next week (the week of March 25-29, 2024). Here is my current schedule for next week:
  Monday March 25: 
  9:00-17:00 Research work at the lab
  
  Tuesday March 26:
  10:00-12:00 Meeting with research team
  14:00-16:00 Prepare presentation for conference 
  
  Wednesday March 27:
  9:00-17:00 Attend conference and present research
  
  Thursday March 28:  
  10:00-12:00 Collaborate with colleagues on research project
  19:00-21:00 Dinner with visiting researchers
  
  Friday March 29:
  9:00-17:00 Analyze research data and write report
  
  Could you let me know your availability for a 30 minute meeting on any of those days? I'm fairly flexible outside of the specific commitments listed.
  
  Looking forward to meeting,
  Jun
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The message you send should be definitive and not require any follow up from the agent you are negotiating with.

other than the turtle file contents
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PREFIX ex: <http://example.org/test#>
PREFIX acl: <http://www.w3.org/ns/auth/acl#>
PREFIX acp: <http://www.w3.org/ns/solid/acp#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX gr: <http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#>

shape ex:EventShape -> schema:ScheduleAction {
    schema:startTime [1..1] xsd:dateTime .
    schema:endTime [1..1] xsd:dateTime .
    schema:description [1..1] xsd:string .
    schema:participant IRI [1..*] .
}

shape ex:PaymentShape -> gr:PaymentMethod {
    # FIXME: Change this - it is just here for demo purposes
    gr:hasCurrencyValue [1..1] xsd:float .
    gr:hasCurrency [1..1] xsd:string .
}

shape ex:EventConfirmationShape -> schema:ScheduleAction {
    ex:event [1..1] @ex:EventShape .
    ex:processId [1..1] xsd:string .
}

shape ex:ConfirmationShape {
    ex:confirm [1..1] xsd:boolean .
    ex:processId [1..1] xsd:string .
}
